mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.user_id, p.title, p.content, p.is_notice, p.created_at, p.updated_at, IFNULL(pl.like_count, 0) AS like_count FROM community_post p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM post_like GROUP BY post_id ) pl ON p.post_id = pl.post_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId} AND p.is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT image_url FROM post_image WHERE post_id = #{postId}
SELECT post_id, user_id, title, content, is_notice, created_at, updated_at FROM community_post WHERE is_deleted = 'N' AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_post WHERE is_deleted = 'N' AND user_id = #{userId}
